item.title: Skyblivion Devs Teasing Something This Week as Oblivion Turns 16
item.description: Skyblivion has been in development for some time now, and as Oblivion celebrates its anniversary, the mod team hints at something special coming.
item.dc:creator: Game Rant

item.title: 8.9 Leaks
item.description:
Deluxe Limited Edition Container
May contain Success Boosters and other rewards.
Success booster stats
Level 1: 15 gold or 6000 credits
Level 2: 200 gold or 80000 credits
Level 3: 1000 gold or 400000 credits
Level ?: ????????????
Dependent on win / Loss of the game
Mega Container
Includes a tank from the list with a 5% drop chance or random rewards:
• Lockbox Key with a 5% drop chance
• Attachment from the list with a 10% drop chance
• Container from the list with a 20% drop chance
• Certificate for Free XP with a 50% drop chance
Each time you open the container, you get 3 guaranteed rewards: days of Premium Account, gold, and 1 Gold Charm.
20 minutes of Prem time can be earned by watching one ad
item.dc:creator: aeson000#6580
